segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the details are sharp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's attention is solely on the dish she's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the tap, unchecked and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how she's not turning it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, damaging everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on that rickety stool, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why would they do something so dangerous?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's encouraging him, hand out for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the indoor disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence could lead to real harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my temper rising just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Adults should be more aware in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
